name: The Fool
meaningUpright: Beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit
meaningUprightCn: 新的开始，天真，自发性，自由精神
meaningReversed: Holding back, recklessness, risk-taking
meaningReversedCn: 退缩，鲁莽，冒险

name: The Magician
meaningUpright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action
meaningUprightCn: 显化，足智多谋，力量，受启发的行动
meaningReversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents
meaningReversedCn: 操纵，计划不周，未开发的才能

name: The High Priestess
meaningUpright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind
meaningUprightCn: 直觉，神圣知识，神圣女性，潜意识
meaningReversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal and silence
meaningReversedCn: 秘密，与直觉断联，退缩和沉默

name: The Empress
meaningUpright: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance
meaningUprightCn: 女性气质，美丽，自然，养育，富足
meaningReversed: Creative block, dependence on others
meaningReversedCn: 创作受阻，依赖他人

name: The Emperor
meaningUpright: Authority, establishment, structure, a father figure
meaningUprightCn: 权威，体制，结构，父亲形象
meaningReversed: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility
meaningReversedCn: 支配，过度控制，缺乏纪律，僵化

name: The Hierophant
meaningUpright: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions
meaningUprightCn: 精神智慧，宗教信仰，从众，传统，机构
meaningReversed: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo
meaningReversedCn: 个人信仰，自由，挑战现状

name: The Lovers
meaningUpright: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices
meaningUprightCn: 爱，和谐，关系，价值观一致，选择
meaningReversed: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values
meaningReversedCn: 自爱，不和谐，失衡，价值观不一致

name: The Chariot
meaningUpright: Control, willpower, success, action, determination
meaningUprightCn: 控制，意志力，成功，行动，决心
meaningReversed: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction
meaningReversedCn: 自律，反对，缺乏方向

name: Strength
meaningUpright: Strength, courage, persuasion, influence, compassion
meaningUprightCn: 力量，勇气，说服，影响，同情
meaningReversed: Inner strength, self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion
meaningReversedCn: 内在力量，自我怀疑，低能量，原始情绪

name: The Hermit
meaningUpright: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance
meaningUprightCn: 灵魂探索，内省，独处，内在指引
meaningReversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal
meaningReversedCn: 孤立，孤独，退缩

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaningUpright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
meaningUprightCn: 好运，业力，生命周期，命运，转折点
meaningReversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles
meaningReversedCn: 厄运，抵制改变，打破循环

name: Justice
meaningUpright: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
meaningUprightCn: 正义，公平，真理，因果，法律
meaningReversed: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty
meaningReversedCn: 不公，缺乏责任感，不诚实

name: The Hanged Man
meaningUpright: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives
meaningUprightCn: 暂停，臣服，放手，新视角
meaningReversed: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision
meaningReversedCn: 延误，抵抗，拖延，优柔寡断

name: Death
meaningUpright: Endings, change, transformation, transition
meaningUprightCn: 结束，改变，转变，过渡
meaningReversed: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging
meaningReversedCn: 抵制改变，个人转变，内在净化

name: Temperance
meaningUpright: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose
meaningUprightCn: 平衡，适度，耐心，目的
meaningReversed: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment
meaningReversedCn: 失衡，过度，自我疗愈，重新调整

name: The Devil
meaningUpright: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality
meaningUprightCn: 阴影自我，依恋，成瘾，限制，性
meaningReversed: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment
meaningReversedCn: 释放限制性信念，探索黑暗思想，超脱

name: The Tower
meaningUpright: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
meaningUprightCn: 突然的改变，动荡，混乱，启示，觉醒
meaningReversed: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster
meaningReversedCn: 个人转变，害怕改变，避免灾难

name: The Star
meaningUpright: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality
meaningUprightCn: 希望，信仰，目标，更新，灵性
meaningReversed: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection
meaningReversedCn: 缺乏信仰，绝望，自我信任，断联

name: The Moon
meaningUpright: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition
meaningUprightCn: 幻觉，恐惧，焦虑，潜意识，直觉
meaningReversed: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion
meaningReversedCn: 释放恐惧，压抑的情绪，内在困惑

name: The Sun
meaningUpright: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality
meaningUprightCn: 积极，乐趣，温暖，成功，活力
meaningReversed: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic
meaningReversedCn: 内在小孩，情绪低落，过度乐观

name: Judgement
meaningUpright: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution
meaningUprightCn: 审判，重生，内在召唤，赦免
meaningReversed: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call
meaningReversedCn: 自我怀疑，内在批评，忽视召唤

name: The World
meaningUpright: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel
meaningUprightCn: 完成，整合，成就，旅行
meaningReversed: Seeking personal closure, short-cuts, delays
meaningReversedCn: 寻求个人了结，捷径，延误

name: Ace of Wands
meaningUpright: Inspiration, new opportunities, growth, potential
meaningUprightCn: 灵感，新机会，成长，潜力
meaningReversed: An emerging idea, lack of direction, distractions, delays
meaningReversedCn: 新兴的想法，缺乏方向，分心，延误

name: Two of Wands
meaningUpright: Future planning, progress, decisions, discovery
meaningUprightCn: 未来规划，进步，决策，发现
meaningReversed: Personal goals, inner alignment, fear of unknown, lack of planning
meaningReversedCn: 个人目标，内在一致，对未知的恐惧，缺乏计划

name: Three of Wands
meaningUpright: Progress, expansion, foresight, overseas opportunities
meaningUprightCn: 进步，扩张，远见，海外机会
meaningReversed: Playing small, lack of foresight, unexpected delays
meaningReversedCn: 畏首畏尾，缺乏远见，意外延误

name: Four of Wands
meaningUpright: Celebration, joy, harmony, relaxation, homecoming
meaningUprightCn: 庆祝，喜悦，和谐，放松，回家
meaningReversed: Personal celebration, inner harmony, conflict with others, transition
meaningReversedCn: 个人庆祝，内在和谐，与他人冲突，过渡

name: Five of Wands
meaningUpright: Conflict, disagreements, competition, tension, diversity
meaningUprightCn: 冲突，分歧，竞争，紧张，多样性
meaningReversed: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, tension release
meaningReversedCn: 内在冲突，避免冲突，释放紧张

name: Six of Wands
meaningUpright: Success, public recognition, progress, self-confidence
meaningUprightCn: 成功，公众认可，进步，自信
meaningReversed: Private achievement, personal definition of success, fall from grace, egotism
meaningReversedCn: 私人成就，个人定义的成功，失势，自我中心

name: Seven of Wands
meaningUpright: Challenge, competition, protection, perseverance
meaningUprightCn: 挑战，竞争，保护，毅力
meaningReversed: Exhaustion, giving up, overwhelmed
meaningReversedCn: 精疲力竭，放弃，不知所措

name: Eight of Wands
meaningUpright: Movement, fast paced change, action, alignment, air travel
meaningUprightCn: 移动，快节奏的变化，行动，一致，航空旅行
meaningReversed: Delays, frustration, resisting change, internal alignment
meaningReversedCn: 延误，挫折，抵制改变，内在一致

name: Nine of Wands
meaningUpright: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith, boundaries
meaningUprightCn: 韧性，勇气，坚持，信仰考验，界限
meaningReversed: Inner resources, struggle, overwhelm, defensive, paranoia
meaningReversedCn: 内在资源，挣扎，不知所措，防御，偏执

name: Ten of Wands
meaningUpright: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
meaningUprightCn: 负担，额外责任，努力工作，完成
meaningReversed: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation, release
meaningReversedCn: 大包大揽，背负重担，授权，释放

name: Page of Wands
meaningUpright: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, limitless potential, free spirit
meaningUprightCn: 灵感，想法，发现，无限潜力，自由精神
meaningReversed: Newly formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting beliefs, spiritual path
meaningReversedCn: 新形成的想法，重导能量，自我限制信念，精神道路

name: Knight of Wands
meaningUpright: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness
meaningUprightCn: 能量，激情，受启发的行动，冒险，冲动
meaningReversed: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays, frustration
meaningReversedCn: 激情项目，匆忙，分散的精力，延误，挫折

name: Queen of Wands
meaningUpright: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determined
meaningUprightCn: 勇气，自信，独立，社交达人，坚定
meaningReversed: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, re-establish sense of self
meaningReversedCn: 自尊，自信，内向，重建自我感

name: King of Wands
meaningUpright: Natural-born leader, vision, entrepreneur, honor
meaningUprightCn: 天生的领导者，愿景，企业家，荣誉
meaningReversed: Impulsiveness, haste, ruthless, high expectations
meaningReversedCn: 冲动，匆忙，无情，高期望

name: Ace of Cups
meaningUpright: Love, new relationships, compassion, creativity
meaningUprightCn: 爱，新关系，同情，创造力
meaningReversed: Self-love, intuition, repressed emotions
meaningReversedCn: 自爱，直觉，压抑的情绪

name: Two of Cups
meaningUpright: Unified love, partnership, mutual attraction
meaningUprightCn: 统一的爱，伙伴关系，相互吸引
meaningReversed: Self-love, break-ups, disharmony, distrust
meaningReversedCn: 自爱，分手，不和谐，不信任

name: Three of Cups
meaningUpright: Celebration, friendship, creativity, collaborations
meaningUprightCn: 庆祝，友谊，创造力，合作
meaningReversed: Independence, alone time, hardcore partying, 'three's a crowd'
meaningReversedCn: 独立，独处时间，疯狂派对，‘三人成众’

name: Four of Cups
meaningUpright: Meditation, contemplation, apathy, re-evaluation
meaningUprightCn: 冥想，沉思，冷漠，重新评估
meaningReversed: Retreat, withdrawal, checking in for alignment
meaningReversedCn: 撤退，退出，检查一致性

name: Five of Cups
meaningUpright: Regret, failure, disappointment, pessimism
meaningUprightCn: 遗憾，失败，失望，悲观
meaningReversed: Personal setbacks, self-forgiveness, moving on
meaningReversedCn: 个人挫折，自我宽恕，继续前进

name: Six of Cups
meaningUpright: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence, joy
meaningUprightCn: 重温过去，童年记忆，纯真，快乐
meaningReversed: Living in the past, forgiveness, lacking playfulness
meaningReversedCn: 活在过去，宽恕，缺乏趣味

name: Seven of Cups
meaningUpright: Opportunities, choices, wishful thinking, illusion
meaningUprightCn: 机会，选择，一厢情愿，幻觉
meaningReversed: Alignment, personal values, overwhelmed by choices
meaningReversedCn: 一致，个人价值观，被选择淹没

name: Eight of Cups
meaningUpright: Disappointment, abandonment, withdrawal, escapism
meaningUprightCn: 失望，遗弃，退缩，逃避
meaningReversed: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting, walking away
meaningReversedCn: 再试一次，优柔寡断，漫无目的漂流，走开

name: Nine of Cups
meaningUpright: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wish come true
meaningUprightCn: 满足，满意，感激，愿望成真
meaningReversed: Inner happiness, materialism, dissatisfaction, indulgence
meaningReversedCn: 内在幸福，唯物主义，不满，放纵

name: Ten of Cups
meaningUpright: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment
meaningUprightCn: 神圣的爱，幸福的关系，和谐，一致
meaningReversed: Disconnection, misaligned values, struggling relationships
meaningReversedCn: 断联，价值观不一致，挣扎的关系

name: Page of Cups
meaningUpright: Creative opportunities, intuitive messages, curiosity, possibility
meaningUprightCn: 创造性机会，直觉信息，好奇心，可能性
meaningReversed: New ideas, doubting intuition, creative blocks, emotional immaturity
meaningReversedCn: 新想法，怀疑直觉，创作受阻，情感不成熟

name: Knight of Cups
meaningUpright: Creativity, romance, charm, imagination, beauty
meaningUprightCn: 创造力，浪漫，魅力，想象力，美
meaningReversed: Overactive imagination, unrealistic, jealous, moody
meaningReversedCn: 过度想象，不切实际，嫉妒，喜怒无常

name: Queen of Cups
meaningUpright: Compassionate, caring, emotionally stable, intuitive, in flow
meaningUprightCn: 富有同情心，关怀，情绪稳定，直觉，顺流而下
meaningReversed: Inner feelings, self-care, self-love, co-dependency
meaningReversedCn: 内在感受，自我照顾，自爱，共依赖

name: King of Cups
meaningUpright: Emotionally balanced, compassionate, diplomatic
meaningUprightCn: 情绪平衡，富有同情心，外交手腕
meaningReversed: Self-compassion, inner feelings, moodiness, emotionally manipulative
meaningReversedCn: 自我同情，内在感受，喜怒无常，情感操纵

name: Ace of Swords
meaningUpright: Breakthroughs, new ideas, mental clarity, success
meaningUprightCn: 突破，新想法，头脑清晰，成功
meaningReversed: Inner clarity, re-thinking an idea, clouded judgement
meaningReversedCn: 内在清晰，重新思考想法，判断模糊

name: Two of Swords
meaningUpright: Difficult decisions, weighing up options, an impasse, avoidance
meaningUprightCn: 艰难的决定，权衡选择，僵局，回避
meaningReversed: Indecision, confusion, information overload, stalemate
meaningReversedCn: 优柔寡断，困惑，信息过载，僵局

name: Three of Swords
meaningUpright: Heartbreak, emotional pain, sorrow, grief, hurt
meaningUprightCn: 心碎，情感痛苦，悲伤，哀痛，伤害
meaningReversed: Negative self-talk, releasing pain, optimism, forgiveness
meaningReversedCn: 消极自我对话，释放痛苦，乐观，宽恕

name: Four of Swords
meaningUpright: Rest, relaxation, meditation, contemplation, recuperation
meaningUprightCn: 休息，放松，冥想，沉思，休养
meaningReversed: Exhaustion, burn-out, deep contemplation, stagnation
meaningReversedCn: 精疲力竭，倦怠，深思，停滞

name: Five of Swords
meaningUpright: Conflict, disagreements, competition, defeat, winning at all costs
meaningUprightCn: 冲突，分歧，竞争，失败，不惜一切代价获胜
meaningReversed: Reconciliation, making amends, past resentment
meaningReversedCn: 和解，补救，过去的怨恨

name: Six of Swords
meaningUpright: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage
meaningUprightCn: 过渡，改变，通过仪式，释放包袱
meaningReversed: Personal transition, resistance to change, unfinished business
meaningReversedCn: 个人过渡，抵制改变，未竟之事

name: Seven of Swords
meaningUpright: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, acting impetuously
meaningUprightCn: 背叛，欺骗，侥幸逃脱，冲动行事
meaningReversed: Imposter syndrome, self-deceit, keeping secrets
meaningReversedCn: 冒名顶替综合症，自欺欺人，保守秘密

name: Eight of Swords
meaningUpright: Negative thoughts, self-imposed restriction, imprisonment, victim mentality
meaningUprightCn: 消极思想，自我施加的限制，监禁，受害者心态
meaningReversed: Self-limiting beliefs, inner critic, releasing negative thoughts, open to new perspectives
meaningReversedCn: 自我限制信念，内在批评，释放消极思想，接受新视角

name: Nine of Swords
meaningUpright: Anxiety, worry, fear, depression, nightmares
meaningUprightCn: 焦虑，担忧，恐惧，抑郁，噩梦
meaningReversed: Inner turmoil, deep-seated fears, secrets, releasing worry
meaningReversedCn: 内在动荡，根深蒂固的恐惧，秘密，释放担忧

name: Ten of Swords
meaningUpright: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis
meaningUprightCn: 痛苦的结局，深深的伤口，背叛，损失，危机
meaningReversed: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end
meaningReversedCn: 恢复，再生，抵制不可避免的结局

name: Page of Swords
meaningUpright: New ideas, curiosity, thirst for knowledge, new ways of communicating
meaningUprightCn: 新想法，好奇心，求知欲，新的沟通方式
meaningReversed: Self-expression, all talk and no action, haphazard action, haste
meaningReversedCn: 自我表达，光说不练，随意行动，匆忙

name: Knight of Swords
meaningUpright: Ambitious, action-oriented, driven to succeed, fast-thinking
meaningUprightCn: 雄心勃勃，行动导向，渴望成功，思维敏捷
meaningReversed: Restless, unfocused, impulsive, burn-out
meaningReversedCn: 焦躁不安，注意力不集中，冲动，倦怠

name: Queen of Swords
meaningUpright: Independent, unbiased judgement, clear boundaries, direct communication
meaningUprightCn: 独立，公正判断，界限分明，直接沟通
meaningReversed: Overly-emotional, easily influenced, bitchy, cold-hearted
meaningReversedCn: 过度情绪化，易受影响，恶毒，冷酷

name: King of Swords
meaningUpright: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth
meaningUprightCn: 头脑清晰，智力，权威，真理
meaningReversed: Quiet power, inner truth, misuse of power, manipulation
meaningReversedCn: 安静的力量，内在真理，滥用权力，操纵

name: Ace of Pentacles
meaningUpright: A new financial or career opportunity, manifestation, abundance
meaningUprightCn: 新的财务或职业机会，显化，富足
meaningReversed: Lost opportunity, lack of planning and foresight
meaningReversedCn: 错失良机，缺乏计划和远见

name: Two of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Multiple priorities, time management, prioritization, adaptability
meaningUprightCn: 多重优先事项，时间管理，优先次序，适应性
meaningReversed: Over-committed, disorganization, reprioritization
meaningReversedCn: 过度承诺，混乱，重新安排优先次序

name: Three of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Teamwork, collaboration, learning, implementation
meaningUprightCn: 团队合作，协作，学习，实施
meaningReversed: Disharmony, misalignment, working alone
meaningReversedCn: 不和谐，不一致，独自工作

name: Four of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity, control
meaningUprightCn: 省钱，安全，保守，稀缺，控制
meaningReversed: Over-spending, greed, self-protection
meaningReversedCn: 过度消费，贪婪，自我保护

name: Five of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation, worry
meaningUprightCn: 经济损失，贫困，匮乏心态，孤立，担忧
meaningReversed: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty
meaningReversedCn: 从经济损失中恢复，精神贫困

name: Six of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Giving, receiving, sharing wealth, generosity, charity
meaningUprightCn: 给予，接受，分享财富，慷慨，慈善
meaningReversed: Self-care, unpaid debt, one-sided charity
meaningReversedCn: 自我照顾，未偿债务，单方面慈善

name: Seven of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Long-term view, sustainable results, perseverance, investment
meaningUprightCn: 长远眼光，可持续结果，毅力，投资
meaningReversed: Lack of long-term vision, limited success or reward
meaningReversedCn: 缺乏长远眼光，有限的成功或回报

name: Eight of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development
meaningUprightCn: 学徒，重复性任务，精通，技能发展
meaningReversed: Self-development, perfectionism, misdirected activity
meaningReversedCn: 自我发展，完美主义，误导性活动

name: Nine of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Abundance, luxury, self-sufficiency, financial independence
meaningUprightCn: 富足，奢华，自给自足，经济独立
meaningReversed: Self-worth, over-investment in work, hustling
meaningReversedCn: 自我价值，过度投入工作，忙碌

name: Ten of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success, contribution
meaningUprightCn: 财富，经济安全，家庭，长期成功，贡献
meaningReversed: The dark side of wealth, financial failure or loss
meaningReversedCn: 财富的阴暗面，经济失败或损失

name: Page of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Manifestation, financial opportunity, skill development
meaningUprightCn: 显化，经济机会，技能发展
meaningReversed: Lack of progress, procrastination, learn from failure
meaningReversedCn: 缺乏进步，拖延，从失败中学习

name: Knight of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Hard work, productivity, routine, conservatism
meaningUprightCn: 努力工作，生产力，常规，保守
meaningReversed: Self-discipline, boredom, feeling 'stuck', perfectionism
meaningReversedCn: 自律，无聊，感觉‘被困’，完美主义

name: Queen of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, a working parent
meaningUprightCn: 养育，务实，提供经济支持，在职父母
meaningReversed: Financial independence, self-care, work-home conflict
meaningReversedCn: 经济独立，自我照顾，工作与家庭冲突

name: King of Pentacles
meaningUpright: Wealth, business, leadership, security, discipline, abundance
meaningUprightCn: 财富，商业，领导力，安全，纪律，富足
meaningReversed: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth and status, stubborn
meaningReversedCn: 理财无能，痴迷财富和地位，顽固
